tvdb: Lucy tells Rafe to be normal he needs a job and she offers to finance him in opening a gym. Elizabeth tells Alison she shouldn't marry Rafe but Stephen convinces Ali not to let anyone stand in the way of love. Ali spills Elizabeth's ""water"" but replaces it with real water. After telling Jamal she doesn't want to quit the band, Marissa asks him to spend time with Stephen and he agrees but asks her not to be alone with Stephen. Livvie admits to Kevin she's attracted to Caleb. He tells her to stay away from him, but she asks Ricky out to make Stephen jealous. Kevin visits Stephen and threatens to send him to Hell.
